Rereadit

A social app on Rails. Rereadit features topics, posts, commenting, favoriting, and a custom voting/ranking algorithm. Email subscription via SendGrid.
Built On: Ruby on Rails, Bootstrap, Bcrypt, Figaro, SendGrid
Date: July 2017
Repository: rereadit
For further details, check out the repository by clicking the link above.
x

Jive Race API

Jive Race API supports the Jive Race app. Users can register for races and create and build teams of runners. JWT authentication middleware and custom authorization scheme.
Built On: Node.js, Express, Mongoose, MongoDB, Jsonwebtoken, Bcrypt, Heroku, mLab
Date: October 2017
Repository: jive-race-api
For further details, check out the repository by clicking the link above.
x

Collab

A collaboration app on Rails. Free public and paid private collaboration spaces. Differentiated collaborator permissions via Devise and Pundit. Accepts payment via Stripe. Integrated markdown rendering.
Built On: Ruby on Rails, Bootstrap, Bcrypt, Figaro, SendGrid, Devise, Pundit, Stripe, RedCarpet, Shoulda, Faker, FactoryGirl
Date: July 2017
Repository: collab
For further details, check out the repository by clicking the link above.
x

Chateau

A chat app inspired by a mashup of medieval greys and Slack.
Built On: AngularJS, Firebase
Date: February 2017
Repository: chateau
For further details, check out the repository by clicking the link above.
x

Jive Race

Jive Race is built on the Jive Race API. Users can register for races and create and build teams of runners. Responsive design on custom-built React components.
Built On: React, AWS
Date: still in development
Repository: jive-race
For further details, check out the repository by clicking the link above.
x

Tabletop

Tabletop is a desktop app built to access the Bloc Educational API. Students can send messages, submit projects, and view mentor schedules.
Built On: Electron, Node.js, Javascript
Date: July 2017
Repository: tabletop
For further details, check out the repository by clicking the link above.
